name: Morii
description:
Morii is looking for something to call "home... 

But he's not seeking a house... 

Explore the rooms looking for those positive feelings, warmth, security, frienship, love... 

Those which can be a "home" for Morii.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow keys - move

Left Click - interact(doors and messages)
